item.title: By: Jose Gama
item.dc:creator: Jose Gama
item.description:
Here is a library of gnuplot functions for cartographic projections in 2D and 3D
https://github.com/tuxcell/gnuplotcartography run gnuplot demo1.gnu gnuplot demo2.gnu gnuplot demo3.gnu
And an R-package (Programming interface): CRAN - Package Rgnuplot https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/Rgnuplot/index.html
The R package can create maps for gnuplot from image files (jpeg, PNG, etc) or shapefiles and plot them in over a dozen cartographic projections
item.content:encoded:
Here is a library of gnuplot functions for cartographic projections in 2D and 3D

https://github.com/tuxcell/gnuplotcartography
run
gnuplot demo1.gnu
gnuplot demo2.gnu
gnuplot demo3.gnu

And an R-package (Programming interface):
CRAN – Package Rgnuplot
https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/Rgnuplot/index.html

The R package can create maps for gnuplot from image files (jpeg, PNG, etc) or shapefiles and plot them in over a dozen cartographic projections
